Title: A Nice Neutral Smell
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), Annabel Oakes, Dennis Saldua (executive story editor), Michael Oppenhuizen (staff writer), Ava Tramer (story editor), Jen Regan
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Keir Gilchrist, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: When a classmate shows interest in him, Sam makes a list of pros and cons to see whether she's girlfriend material. Casey gets a prestigious offer.
